In Another World with My Smartphone
In a Different World with My Smartphone

akas: Isekai wa smartphone to tomo ni. (original title)
Be'olam Aher Im Ha'telefon Shli Israel (Hebrew title)
In Another World with My Smartphone World-wide (English title)
In a Different World with My Smartphone World-wide (English title) (alternative title)
akas from release info: Isekai wa smartphone to tomo ni. (original title)
Be'olam Aher Im Ha'telefon Shli Israel (Hebrew title)
In Another World with My Smartphone World-wide (English title)
In a Different World with My Smartphone World-wide (English title) (alternative title)

1.title: Awakening, and Another World

episode of.title: In Another World with My Smartphone (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

1.plot: After dying due to God's mistake, Touya is reborn in another world? There he meets the twin sisters, Elze and Linze, and starts his new life in another world along with the smartphone he got God to let him use in the new world. Thanks to God's power Touya's a new person with increased abilities and a new talent for magic, so he uses his super convenient smartphone to help defeat beasts, create ice cream in the new world, and start enjoying his new-found life. What will happen to Touya's life as time goes on?

2.title: First Journey, and Samurai

episode of.title: In Another World with My Smartphone (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

2.plot: While surprised by the differences from his previous world, Touya is growing accustomed to living in the new world with his smartphone. Together, he, Elze, and Linze accept a mission to head to the Royal Capital. Along the way they encounter a young samurai, Yae, who dropped all of her travel coins, a currency in the new world. After treating Yae to sate her hunger, Touya grows worried about his own savings due to how much she eats. Afterward Yae joins their party to repay the favor, and their traveling group encounters Sushie, heiress to a duchy, under attack.

3.title: Shougi Board, and Underground Ruins

episode of.title: In Another World with My Smartphone (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

3.plot: Touya and the others head to ruins on a new quest from the Guild to defeat a dullahan. There they encounter the ancient royal capital, abandoned after the capital was moved a millennium ago. After finishing their quest, Touya and the others explore the underground ruins for treasure. Yet what they find isn't a mountain of treasure, but a magic beast made of crystal. No attacks work on its hard body, it absorbs magic, and it even regenerates from wounds. Touya and the rest struggle against such a powerful creature...What on earth is the true identity of such a magic ...

4.title: Engagement, and an Uninvited Visitor

episode of.title: In Another World with My Smartphone (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

4.plot: Touya is brought to the royal palace by the Duke. There he finds the King, bedridden, on the verge of death after being poisoned by someone...No one knows how to treat it, and many believe there's no hope of saving him. Yet high-spec Touya handles the poison with ease. He saves the King with his super Healing magic, Recovery, and even catches the criminal who poisoned the King quickly, bringing everything to resolution. Meanwhile, after watching Touya's actions, Princess Yumina makes a startling declaration.

5.title: Slime Castle, and New Functions

episode of.title: In Another World with My Smartphone (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

5.plot: Touya and the others set out to investigate some magic beasts, but it turns out their destination is the castle of a mage who researched slimes, which they'd all been avoiding (though Touya seems excited?)

6.title: Moving, and a Dragon

episode of.title: In Another World with My Smartphone (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

6.plot: After receiving a huge mansion in place of court rank, Touya and the others begin living their usual dense, thickheaded lifestyle. They receive a mission to go to Mismede, but on their journey they encounter a dragon attacking a village!

7.title: Nation of Beastmen, and an Observer

episode of.title: In Another World with My Smartphone (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

7.plot: Touya's party heads out for Mismede once more. When they finally arrive in Mismede's royal capital, Berge, they head to the palace for an audience with King Jamukha. Then somehow Touya and the King end up doing battle in their fighting arena?!

8.title: Daily Life, and Onward to Eashen

episode of.title: In Another World with My Smartphone (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

8.plot: After returning from the Kingdom of Mismede, Touya and the others enjoy their daily life. At Sushie's request they head back to Mismede where they find Leen and Paula. Leen asks Touya and the others to investigate some ancient ruins.

9.title: Oedo, and the Immortal Gem

episode of.title: In Another World with My Smartphone (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

9.plot: Touya arrives in Oedo, a Japanese-style castle town within Tokugawa Ieyahsu's domain. At Yae's home he meets their servant, Ayane, and Yae's mother, Nanae, before hearing that Yae's father and brother went off to war with Ieyahsu.

10.title: Ocean, and Vacations

episode of.title: In Another World with My Smartphone (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

10.plot: After arriving at the beach where the Nilya Ruins lie, Touya and the others take a moment to enjoy the seaside. With so many beautiful girls in swimsuits, Touya's heart is racing!

11.title: Panties, and an Aerial Garden

episode of.title: In Another World with My Smartphone (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

11.plot: Before him lies a young girl in white panties. After Touya arrives at the aerial garden, he's greeted by a young girl in white panties, Francesca.

12.title: Decisions, and With My Smartphone

episode of.title: In Another World with My Smartphone (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

12.plot: When Touya returns to the mansion, the problem of taking his brides awaits. Yumina and Linze push and push until Touya accepts his engagements. Even Elze and Yae get to join in the polygyny.

imdb.plot outline: Touya Mochizuki was accidentally killed, and as an apology, God allows him to be reborn in a fantasy world and will grant him any one wish he desires. And so, Touya chooses to keep his smartphone in the next world. In his second chance at life, he befriends many important figures and comes across the world's secret. He inherits the legacy of an ancient civilization and travels around nonchalantly while possessing powers that rival this world's kings.
imdb.title: In Another World with My Smartphone
plot: Touya Mochizuki was accidentally killed, and as an apology, God allows him to be reborn in a fantasy world and will grant him any one wish he desires. And so, Touya chooses to keep his smartphone in the next world. In his second chance at life, he befriends many important figures and comes across the world's secret. He inherits the legacy of an ancient civilization and travels around nonchalantly while possessing powers that rival this world's kings.
